title: Relatable Characters Not Always An Option For Women Gamers
teaser: Changes in the industry aren’t specific to technology -- the demographics of video game players themselves are changing.
contentencoded:
Every year, the Electronic Entertainment Expo, E3, is a chance for video game producers to showcase their latest developments. But changes in the industry aren’t specific to technology — the demographics of gamers themselves are changing.

NPR’s Laura Sydell joins Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti from Los Angeles to discuss the expo and changing demographics.

Guest

  • Laura Sydell, correspondent for NPR’s Arts Desk. She tweets @Sydell.
